name: General Comic Trivia, Marvel and DC Quiz | Entertainment | 15 Questions

questions.text: Which of the following people is not related to Cyclops (Scott Summers)?
questions.explanation:
Mister Sinister.

	Corsair of the Starjammers is his father, Havok is his brother, and Cable is his son.

questions.text: What Department of the Canadian government did Wolverine work for before he joined X-Men?
questions.explanation:
Department H.

	Department H also ran Alpha Flight and other superhuman groups in Canada.

questions.text: Who said this quote about Batman, "He may only be human, but he is the most dangerous human on Earth."?
questions.explanation:
Superman.

	The Hyperclan had captured all of JLA except for Batman and because he has no superhuman powers they considered him no threat. Batman ends up beating the whole clan sigle handedly and saving the Earth.

questions.text: Who once uprooted the entire Baxter building with his bare hands?
questions.explanation:
Gladiator.

	Gladiator the personal protector of the Shi'Ar Empress ripped the building right off its foundations. It is also believed he used some Shi'Ar technology to keep the building from collapsing under its own weight.

questions.text: Which of the following is NOT one of the humanoid races that inhabit the nine worlds of Asgard?
questions.explanation:
nymphs.

	The six races are the Gods, Dwarves, Giants, Demons, Elves, and the Trolls.

questions.text: Who killed Kyle Rayner's (Green Lantern) greatest love, Alexandra Dewitt?
What was the name of the planet Galactus was born on?
questions.explanation:
Taa.

	Galactus, the sole survivor of the universe that existed before ours, was a space explorer born on the planet Taa.

questions.text: Which of the following people have been watching Superman ever since he arrived on this planet? He sensed Superman's potential and decided it was the best thing just in case Kal-El decided to go rogue.
questions.explanation:
Martian Manhunter.

	This was revealed in the Martain Manhunter series.

questions.text: What is the name of the only substance that can stop Cyclop's optic blasts?
questions.explanation:
ruby quartz.

	Due to Cyclops inability to control his optic blasts, he must always wear a pair of ruby quartz glasses.

questions.text: What is the High Evolutionary's real name?
questions.explanation:
Herbert Wyndham.

	Herbert Wyndham was a student attending Oxford University in the 1930's who built a machine capable of accelerating the genetic evolution of living organisms.  His first test subject was his pet dog which he managed to evolve into a creature who stood upright and had the intelligence of a chimpanzee.

questions.text: True/False: In the Kingdom Come series, Green Lantern's ring had no effect on yellow.
questions.explanation:
false.

	Wood!  The ring was powerless against wood, but yellow was not a problem.

questions.text: Who is the father of the Midgard serpent?
questions.explanation:
Loki.

	According to Norse legend, Jormungand, the Midgard Serpent, was the son of the Asgardian prince Loki and of the sorceress Angrboda.  Both Loki and Angrboda were descended from the Frost Giants of Jotunheim and were of humanoid appearance.

questions.text: Which one of the following gamma powered people was not exposed directly to gamma radiation?
questions.explanation:
She-Hulk.

	A gamma-irradiated blood transfusion from cousin Bruce "The Incredible Hulk" Banner gave Jen her Hulkish powers: like Bruce, she turned mean, green and super-strong when she got excited, only he was a bit stronger and she was a lot smarter.

Mongul and Cyborg Superman.

	When Coast City was decimated by Mongul and the Cyborg Superman, GL was denied the power to resurrect the city and its inhabitants by the Guardians.

questions.text: Who was the mutant responsible for curing the Legacy virus?
questions.explanation:
Colossus.

	Piotr Rasputin, the stalwart X-Man known as Colossus, sacrificed his life to eradicate the Legacy Virus and deliver countless other mutants from death's doorstep
